text: The Department of Divineguma Development has planned to implement a leafy vegetable and green leaves cultivation programme covering all 11 Divisional Secretary's Divisions in Kegalle District.About 445 training programmes have already been conducted in this regard with a good contribution of farmers.Distribution of plants for Mawanella Divisional Secretary's Division will held soon and plants required for the Warakapola Divisional Secretary's Division are already being ordered and plants for other divisions will be provided in the future.
title: Leafy Vegetable and green leave cultivation programme
